strapiPost.title: Bentonville Christmas Parade On TV
strapiPost.content:
If you missed out on the Bentonville Christmas Parade, Downtown Bentonville Inc. (DBI) has a gift for you!

  • TV stars: The DBI team pulled some strings with our local news outlet, KNWA, and got a slot for the production of the parade to air on Christmas Day at 8:30a. The production is part of DBIâ€™s storytelling project, DWTN Media, and will be a 30min show complete with parade highlights and community interviews. 
  • Double feature: And if you miss it Christmas morning, you can watch it at 10a on New Years Day before the Rose Parade! Even if you were at the parade, the show will be worth checking out. You might see yourself on TV! 

Click HERE for more details.
